column5: This condo is a one bedroom, one bath and is located minutes from NASA and the Kemah boardwalk. Some amenities included in your booking:  -Two parking spaces -Wifi -3 TVs equipped with Hulu and Netflix  -Full kitchen   Dining space has been converted to a loft style room, so if you have a child traveling with you, this area is perfect for them (my daughter loves it!). It has a twin sized bed that they need to crawl a small ladder to get to.  The master bedroom has a full mattress.
